title: How to Make Vegan Nutella

steps.headline: Scatter the hazelnuts on a baking sheet.
steps.description: Roast them for 10 to 14 minutes. Allow them to cool completely and gently rub the hazelnuts with a paper towel to remove the skins.

steps.headline: Add the hazelnuts in a food processor.
steps.description: Process them until you achieve a butter-like mixture.

steps.headline: Measure and add the rest of the ingredients to the food processor.
steps.description: Blend everything for about 2-3 minutes. Stop the processor occasionally to scrape down the sides, so that everything gets incorporated and thoroughly mixed.

steps.headline: Use the mixture immediately or store in an airtight container.

text: Preheat the oven to 420ºF/215ºC.  Scatter the hazelnuts on a baking sheet. Roast them for 10 to 14 minutes. Allow them to cool completely and gently rub the hazelnuts with a paper towel to remove the skins. Add the hazelnuts in a food processor. Process them until you achieve a butter-like mixture. Measure and add the rest of the ingredients to the food processor. Blend everything for about 2-3 minutes. Stop the processor occasionally to scrape down the sides, so that everything gets incorporated and thoroughly mixed. Use the mixture immediately or store in an airtight container.
